CustomField.description: Default value is false which will pick LoanDisbursalFilegenJob. If this option is selected, the disbursal Transaction Distributions that is DisbursalDistributionFilegenJob will be picked up for ACH file gen.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default value is false which will pick LoanDisbursalFilegenJob. If this option is selected, the disbursal Transaction Distributions that is DisbursalDistributionFilegenJob will be picked up for ACH file gen.
CustomField.label: Use Disbursal Distribution for Filegen
